item.title: 诺斯罗普-格鲁曼公司向航天初创企业 Firefly Aerospace 投资 5000 万美元
item.description: 美国国防承包商诺斯罗普-格鲁曼公司（Northrop Grumman）与萤火虫宇航公司（Firefly Aerospace）周四表示，诺斯罗普-格鲁曼公司已向太空初创公司投资 5000 万美元，以帮助生产双方联合开发的火箭。【原文：U.S. defense contractor Northrop Grumman has invested $50 million into space startup Firefly Aerospace to aid the production of their jointly developed rocket, the companies said on Thursday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，耐克长期担任设计和创新主管的约翰-霍克将退休
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四援引一份内部备忘录报道，耐克公司首席创新官约翰-霍克（John Hoke）在为这家全球最大的运动服装公司开发新产品三十多年后即将退休。【原文：Nike's chief innovation officer, John Hoke, is retiring after more than three decades shaping new products at the world's largest sportswear company, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing an internal memo.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空局将波音监管授权计划延长三年
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局周四表示，将把一项允许波音公司代表该局执行某些任务的计划延长三年。【原文：The U.S. Federal Aviation Administration on Thursday said it would extend by three years a program that allows Boeing to perform some tasks on the agency's behalf.】

item.title: 特朗普的关税总计：全球企业称已达 340 亿美元且仍在继续
item.description: 根据路透社对企业披露信息的分析，唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易战已导致企业损失超过 340 亿美元的销售额和更高的成本。【原文：President Donald Trump's trade war has cost companies more than $34 billion in lost sales and higher costs, according to a Reuters analysis of corporate disclosures, a toll that is expected to rise as ongoing uncertainty over tariffs paralyzes decision making at some of the world's largest companies.】

item.title: 消息人士称，阿尔法-罗密欧可能推迟推出新款 Stelvio SUV
item.description: 两位消息人士周四告诉路透社，阿尔法-罗密欧将推迟推出新款Stelvio大型SUV，因为在电动汽车需求不振的情况下，阿尔法-罗密欧将重新评估其战略。【原文：Alfa Romeo is set to postpone the launch of the new version of its Stelvio large SUV as it reassesses its strategies amid tepid demand for electric vehicles, two sources told Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 备忘录显示，Business Insider 裁员 21
item.description: 商业内幕》（Business Insider）周四的一份内部备忘录显示，该公司正在裁员约 21%，因为这家财经新闻媒体正在努力应对搜索流量的萎缩以及 ChatGPT 等人工智能生成工具的日益普及。【原文：Business Insider is laying off about 21% of its workforce, an internal memo showed on Thursday, as the financial news outlet grapples with shrinking search traffic and the growing use of generative AI tools such as ChatGPT.】

item.title: 首席执行官称关税不确定性不会影响 Holcim 在美国的扩张
item.description: 瑞士建材供应商 Holcim 首席执行官周四表示，关税的不确定性不会阻碍 Holcim 进军美国的计划。【原文：Uncertainty over tariffs will not stall Holcim's plans to expand into the United States, the chief executive officer of the Swiss building materials supplier said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美联储古尔斯比：如果避免关税，政策利率可以下调
item.description: 芝加哥联邦储备银行行长古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）周四表示，鉴于经济的基本实力和通胀的走向，他认为如果能通过贸易协议或其他方式避免大规模关税，央行很可能会降息。【原文：Chicago Federal Reserve Bank President Austan Goolsbee on Thursday said he believes that if big tariffs could be avoided, either through trade deals or otherwise, the central bank could likely cut interest rates, given the underlying strength of the economy and the direction of inflation.】

item.title: Vanguard 扩展 "投资者选择 "代理投票计划
item.description: 顶级共同基金管理公司先锋集团（Vanguard Group）周四表示，将把有资格在其基金中进行代理投票的投资者人数增加两倍左右，达到 1000 万人，继续努力减少公司对股东选举的直接影响。【原文：Top mutual fund manager Vanguard Group on Thursday said it would roughly triple to 10 million the number of investors eligible to direct proxy votes in their funds, continuing an effort that would reduce the firm's direct impact on shareholder elections.】

item.title: 波音公司首席执行官表示，波音的目标是在年底前将 737 MAX 的月产量提高到 47 架
item.description: 波音公司首席执行官凯利-奥特伯格（Kelly Ortberg）周四表示，他希望将737 MAX的月产量从现在的30架左右提高到今年年底的47架。【原文：Boeing CEO Kelly Ortberg said on Thursday that he wants to crank 737 MAX production up from mid-30s a month now to 47 by the end of the year.】

item.title: 高盛称交易前景良好，但时机尚不确定
item.description: 高盛集团总裁约翰-沃尔德伦（John Waldron）周四表示，投资银行业务的前景依然 "相当不错"。【原文：Goldman Sachs President John Waldron said on Thursday that the outlook for investment banking remains "quite good."】

item.title: 美国 4 月未决房屋销售大幅下降
item.description: 由于抵押贷款利率上升和经济不确定性影响了需求，4 月份美国旧房购买合同降幅超过预期。【原文：Contracts to buy U.S. previously owned homes fell more than expected in April as rising mortgage rates and economic uncertainty weighed on demand.】

item.title: 纽约时报》与亚马逊签署人工智能许可协议
item.description: 纽约时报》周四表示，它将授权亚马逊公司在其人工智能产品中使用其编辑内容，这标志着该出版商首次与生成式人工智能达成授权协议。【原文：The New York Times said on Thursday it would license its editorial content to Amazon.com for use in the tech giant's artificial-intelligence products, marking the publisher's first licensing deal tied to generative AI.】

item.title: Grammarly 获 General Catalyst 10 亿美元投资，打造人工智能生产力平台
item.description: Grammarly和General Catalyst两家公司周四表示，Grammarly已从General Catalyst获得10亿美元的非摊薄性融资，用于扩大其人工智能（AI）产品，旨在发展成为一个全面的生产力平台。【原文：Grammarly has raised $1 billion in non-dilutive financing from General Catalyst to expand its artificial intelligence (AI) offerings, aiming to grow into a comprehensive productivity platform, the companies said on Thursday.】

item.title: 阿尔迪老板称英国超市不存在价格战
item.description: 德国折扣店阿尔迪（Aldi）英国分部的老板说，英国并没有陷入超市价格战，尽管有一些说法与此相反，他警告竞争对手说，他的业务仍有 "巨大的增长潜力"。【原文：Britain is not in the midst of a supermarket price war despite some suggestions to the contrary, the boss of the UK arm of German discounter Aldi said, warning rivals his business still had "huge potential" for growth.】

item.title: 巴西经济预计在第一季度恢复强劲增长
item.description: 路透社的一项民意调查显示，由于家庭支出增加和私人投资上升，预计巴西经济将在 2025 年第一季度恢复去年的强劲势头。【原文：Brazil's economy is projected to have resumed last year's strong run in the first quarter of 2025 thanks to rising household spending and higher private investment, a Reuters poll found.】

item.title: IDC 因关税波动下调全球智能手机出货量预期
item.description: 国际数据公司（International Data Corp）周四将2025年全球智能手机出货量增长率预期从2.6%下调至0.6%，理由是关税引发的经济不确定性和消费支出的回落。【原文：International Data Corp slashed its 2025 global smartphone shipment growth forecast to 0.6% from 2.6% on Thursday, citing tariff-driven economic uncertainty and a pullback in consumer spending.】

item.title: 英国超市阿斯达迎来复苏 "绿芽
item.description: 英国超市阿斯达（Asda）的老板说，由于价格下降和产品供应增加，该集团第一季度的销售额下降速度放缓，他看到了复苏的 "绿芽"。【原文：The boss of British supermarket Asda said he was seeing "green shoots" of recovery after the group slowed the rate of its sales decline in its first quarter, helped by lower prices and better product availability.】

item.title: 美国第一季度企业利润大幅下降
item.description: 美国企业利润在第一季度大幅下滑，今年可能会继续受到关税带来的成本上升的挤压，这有可能削弱经济扩张。【原文：U.S. corporate profits fell sharply in the first quarter and could continue to be squeezed this year by higher costs from tariffs that are threatening to undercut the economic expansion.】

item.title: 马斯克退出特朗普政府提升特斯拉股价，有望重新成为关注焦点
item.description: 特斯拉公司首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）将退出特朗普政府的消息传出后，特斯拉股价周四上涨超过 2%。【原文：Tesla shares rose more than 2% on Thursday after news that CEO Elon Musk was stepping away from the Trump administration, fueling hopes that he will sharpen focus on the automaker as it gears up for its hotly anticipated robotaxi debut.】

item.title: 埃克森公司称有信心赢得雪佛龙-赫斯交易纠纷的胜利
item.description: 埃克森美孚高级副总裁尼尔-查普曼（Neil Chapman）周四表示，埃克森美孚与雪佛龙计划收购赫斯公司的合同纠纷仲裁程序本周结束，预计将在两到三个月内做出裁决。【原文：The arbitration proceedings in Exxon Mobil's contractual dispute over Chevron's planned acquisition of Hess concluded this week and a decision is expected in about two to three months, said Exxon senior vice president Neil Chapman on Thursday.】

item.title: Bath & Body Works 因关税影响极小，季度利润超出预期
item.description: Bath & Body Works 周四公布的第一季度利润超出预期，原因是该公司的香水和个人护理产品需求稳定，加之受进口关税影响有限，有助于抵消美国零售业的整体压力。【原文：Bath & Body Works on Thursday beat first-quarter profit estimates as steady demand for its fragrances and personal care products, combined with its limited exposure to import tariffs, helped counter broader pressures in the U.S. retail sector.】

item.title: 白宫顾问称三项贸易协议几近达成
item.description: 白宫经济顾问凯文-哈塞特（Kevin Hassett）周四表示，尽管贸易法庭的裁决阻止了唐纳德-特朗普总统的大部分关税措施，但三项贸易协议已接近达成，他预计还会有更多贸易协议。【原文：White House economic adviser Kevin Hassett said on Thursday three trade deals were nearly done and he expected more despite a trade court ruling that blocked most of President Donald Trump's tariffs.】

item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数增幅超预期，劳动力市场趋于宽松
item.description: 上周新申请失业救济金的美国人数增幅超过预期，而随着劳动力市场状况的持续缓解，5月份的失业率似乎有所回升。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for unemployment benefits increased more than expected last week, while the jobless rate appeared to have picked up in May as labor market conditions continue to ease.】

item.title: 德意志交易所反弹显示欧洲正在重新评级
item.description: 随着财政刺激政策和全球资本流动的变化，欧洲正在从低迷的水平上推动广泛的重新评级，德意志交易所股票的反弹说明了欧洲正在缩小与华尔街同行之间的价值差距。【原文：A rally in Deutsche Boerse shares illustrates how Europe is bridging a value gap with its Wall Street peers, as fiscal stimulus and a shift in global capital flows help drive a broad re-rating from depressed levels.】

item.title: 零售需求疲软，荷美尔食品公司收紧年度利润预期
item.description: 霍梅尔食品公司（Hormel Foods）周四将其年度利润预测向下限收紧，因为这家 Skippy 花生酱生产商正努力解决供应链问题，而需求疲软可能会抵消其提价带来的好处。【原文：Hormel Foods tightened its annual profit forecast towards the lower end on Thursday, as the Skippy peanut butter maker struggles with supply chain issues and weak demand that may counter the benefits of its price hikes.】

item.title: 德国寻求对谷歌等网络平台征收 10%的税款
item.description: 德国新任文化部长告诉《Stern》杂志，德国正在考虑对 Alphabet 旗下的谷歌和 Meta 旗下的 Facebook 等大型网络平台征收 10%的税，此举可能会加剧与特朗普政府的贸易紧张关系。【原文：Germany is considering a 10% tax on large online platforms like Alphabet's Google and Meta's Facebook , its new culture minister told magazine Stern, in a move likely to heighten trade tensions with the Trump administration.】

item.title: 摩根大通聘请前汇丰银行交易员 Kamal Jabre 推动欧洲、中东和非洲地区的增长
item.description: 根据路透社周四看到的一份备忘录，摩根大通已任命汇丰银行前全球并购主管卡迈勒-贾布雷（Kamal Jabre）为其新任并购部副主席，负责推动在欧洲、中东和非洲（EMEA）的扩张。【原文：JPMorgan has named HSBC's former global head of mergers and acquisitions, Kamal Jabre, as its new M&A Vice Chair to drive expansion across Europe, the Middle East and Africa (EMEA), according to a memo seen by Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 欧盟调查后，Shein将加强产品安全检测
item.description: 快速时尚零售商 Shein 周四表示，今年将加强对产品的检测，因为欧盟警告称，如果该公司不解决欧盟对其网站上销售的不安全和危险产品的担忧，将被处以罚款。【原文：Fast-fashion retailer Shein on Thursday said it would increase its testing of products this year, after the European Union warned of fines if it does not address the bloc's concerns about unsafe and dangerous products sold on its site.】

item.title: 受关税影响，电子产品零售商百思买下调年度销售预期
item.description: 百思买周四下调了年度可比销售额预期，原因是有迹象表明，消费者对家电、家庭影院和游戏机等大件商品的需求将受到美国关税的压力。【原文：Best Buy slashed its annual comparable sales forecast on Thursday, on signs that consumer demand for big-ticket items such as appliances, home theater and gaming consoles will be pressured by U.S. tariffs.】
